column3: Would you like to plant a Berry?

The {tag:0} was planted in the
soft, earthy soil.
Would you like to sprinkle some water?

There {tag:0} {tag:1} {tag:2}!
Would you like to pick {tag:3}?
You left the {tag:0} plant as is.

Your Bag is full.
The {tag:0} couldn’t be taken.

Hello! Here you may cook Berries and turn them
into Poffins.

OK, all your other Pokémon can go on ahead to
the square and play!
There isn’t a Berry to cook!

Sorry, you must have a Poffin Case if you want to
cook some Berries.

OK! Let’s get cooking! Please choose the Berry
you want to cook from your Bag.

Please visit again whenever you get the urge
to cook!

Would you like to discard this
{tag:0}?
Eating a spicy Poffin raises coolness.
Eating a dry Poffin raises beauty.
Eating a sweet Poffin raises cuteness.
Eating a bitter Poffin raises cleverness.
Eating a sour Poffin raises toughness.

You put away the {tag:0} in the
Poffin Case.
Would you like to keep cooking Poffins?

Please choose the Berry you want to cook from
your Bag.
There isn’t a Berry to cook.

Which Pokémon would you like to take a stroll
together with?

OK, your other Pokémon can go on ahead to the
square and play!

It’ll be waiting for you in the square.
Have a great time!
You can’t take that Pokémon on a stroll with you.

Would you like to return the selected Berry to
your Bag?

Would you like to start cooking with this
Berry selection?

They’ll be waiting for you in the square.
Have a great time!
